patan gannakotama me mokakda bole kiyala hitha gena goda wadunu kattiya anapekshitha thigasmakata lak karanna nam balaporoththuwak naha.kanthawak hatiyata mehema mathrukawak gana katha karana eka sadachara sampannada kiyala magen prashna karannath kipa denekma idiripath wenna puluwan.kohoma wunath kalayak thisse ananthawath katha wena ,katha wuna kathandarayak gana mage andaraya liyala damma oon.amathara atuwa tika motada.bahimuko kelinma kathawata.manussayo hatiyata upadinakota koyi kawuruth enne prabhashwara manasak ekka kiyalane dharmaye thiyenne.kaleth ekka ekathu wena kunu kandal saha watina kiyana gnyana sambareth ekka me manasa aluth wenawa.dushitha ho diyunu wenawa.kaleth ekka awaboda karaganime hakiyawa wadi wenawa.parinatha wenawa kiyalane ookata kiyanne.mathak karala balannako thama thamange jiwitha athdakim ekkama.issara tharam dan samahara pudgalayan,karana ekka tharaha noyanna puluwan.samahara wita issarata wada aawegashili wennath puluwan.issara kopa gaththa dekata dan anukampawak wage deyak athi wennath puluwan.awurudu dolaha dahathunedi kellek nam kollek dakkama ,kollek nam kellek dakkama athiwunu thigasma me weddi koyi tharamak nam thuni wela adda?eeth samahara pudgala charitha issaraha samaharawita ee nambaara wayasedi athi nowunu tharam aawegashili premaniya hangum enawa adda?hithala balanna.jiwithe minissu mona tharamak nam premaya wenuwen parithyaga karala thiyenawada?samahara wita api ekanga nowunath jiwithaya pawa.ehema premayen awasanayata apata labenne monawada?dharmaye anithyaya kiyala thiyena bawath ,ape gayakayo "lowe paraduma misaka kisida labu dinumak na"kiyala kiyanna ganna bawath apata therenne ethakota.habayi ee welawata witharayi.ape hithata aayemath ara mawagaththa prema manorajjaya nadaththu karanna oona wenawa.ethana thama kossa.ahaka dapu pathakata wada hitha yanne aluth dekata.jiwithe aapassata karakawala mula sita patan ganna uthsahaya.eekath lesi pahasu wenne naha.awurudu hata haththawak wechcha mulu jiwithen ee weddi salakiya yuthu kotasak gewila iwarayi.wikalpayak naha.samaharu nam ethanin ehata harenne ara thithata thitha thiyapu desata.ethanadi kotu kirili patan gannawa.gedara sita rajanduwa dakwa.eelangata kotu panili.sthri purusa wenasak nathiwa jiwanaya hoyagena yana gamana.......oonna aawa hondama thanata.jiwithe kawamadaka hari ehema dekata muhuna denna wunoth oba mokada karanne?kotu panillada?nathnam kotu kirillada?ehemath nathnam???????
